text: [Music]
greetings my name is Matt Wood and I'm
here at the AWS headquarters in Seattle
to give you an update on Amazon Aurora
until now Aurora was available only in
large instance types in the R3 instance
class because Aurora is primarily
designed for large production class
applications Arthur instances are great
for production workloads but they're not
as cost effective for smaller workloads
such as development and test so today
we're anouncing the availability of T2
medium instances for Amazon Aurora T2
medium instances of Aurora are very cost
effective for smaller workloads such as
development and test and they still give
you the option to use larger R3 class
instances for production deployment
after you start using Aurora for T2
instances should the performance
requirements of your database increase
you can switch at any time to the larger
R3 class in just a few clicks in the AWS
console that's all thanks a
lot
[Music]
